ord,
bookName,
ISBN,
price,

mapper.update:
update book
bookName = #{bookName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ISBN = #{ISBN,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
press = #{press,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bookClass = #{bookClass,jdbcType=BIGINT},
mark = #{mark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
picture = #{picture,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ord = #{ord,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update book set bookName = #{bookName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISBN = #{ISBN,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, press = #{press,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bookClass = #{bookClass,jdbcType=BIGINT}, mark = #{mark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, picture = #{picture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ord = #{ord,jdbcType=BIGINT}
